001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages;
002
003public enum MessageType {
004    REQUEST,
005    RESPONSE,
006
007    ;
008
009    public static MessageType fromOpcodeBestEffort(int opcode) {
010        if (opcode % 2 == 0) {
011            return REQUEST;
012        } else {
013            return RESPONSE;
014        }
015    }
016}
